text: Anna Mouglalis (; born 26 April 1978) is a French actress.France Inter: Anna Mouglalis (Archiv)Short biography on the occasion of his participation in the radio programme Nonabstant 23 /11/ 2009. In 2000 she co-starred with Isabelle Huppert in Claude Chabrol's Merci pour le chocolat. In 2002 she was chosen by Karl Lagerfeld for the ad campaign for the Amateur Allure de Chanel perfume. Mouglalis was cast as Coco Chanel in the 2009 movie Coco Chanel & Igor Stravinsky. ==References== Category:French models Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Var Category:1978 births Category:Living people
title: Anna Mouglalis
